name: The lost city of Zorocco
description: At last you and your team have discovered the lost of city of Zorocco and the lost gold, your team is over joyed to find the city and starts exploring, but you have set your eyes on the gold, you decided to kill everyone and then elope with the gold and blame the whole thing on an accident, So you have to kill all your teammates in a discrete manner without getting caught and claim all the gold. All the best pirate!!!
